tap.description: Primary user activation on a component.

toggle.description: Switch a boolean state inside the component.

select.description: Choose one item from a set or group.

open.description: Reveal a hidden container or expanded region.

close.description: Hide an opened container or region.

expand.description: Expand a component to reveal more structure.

collapse.description: Collapse a component to hide extended content.

navigate.description: Navigate to a new screen or route.

submit.description: Commit or validate input inside a field or form.

reveal.description: Reveal quick actions or contextual options.

menu.description: Open a contextual menu attached to a component.

longpress.description: Activate an alternative or extended action.
